# Radix UI

> Radix UI is an open-source React component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.

## Radix Primitives

Unstyled, accessible React components for building high-quality design systems and web applications.

### Overview
- [Accessibility](/llms-output/primitives/accessibility.md): Radix Primitives follow the WAI-ARIA authoring practices guidelines and are tested in a wide selection of modern browsers and commonly used assistive technologies.
- [Getting started](/llms-output/primitives/getting-started.md): A quick tutorial to get you up and running with Radix Primitives.
- [Introduction](/llms-output/primitives/introduction.md): An open-source UI component library for building high-quality, accessible design systems and web apps.
- [Releases](/llms-output/primitives/releases.md): Radix Primitives releases and their changelogs.

### Guides
- [Animation](/llms-output/primitives/animation.md): Animate Radix Primitives with CSS keyframes or the JavaScript animation library of your choice.
- [Composition](/llms-output/primitives/composition.md): Use the `asChild` prop to compose Radix's functionality onto alternative element types or your own React components.
- [Server-side rendering](/llms-output/primitives/server-side-rendering.md): Radix Primitives can be rendered on the server. However, Primitives in React versions less than 18 rely on hydration for ids.
- [Styling](/llms-output/primitives/styling.md): Radix Primitives are unstyled—and compatible with any styling solution—giving you complete control over styling.

### Components
- [Accordion](/llms-output/primitives/accordion.md): A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal an associated section of content.
- [Alert Dialog](/llms-output/primitives/alert-dialog.md): A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.
- [Aspect Ratio](/llms-output/primitives/aspect-ratio.md): Displays content within a desired ratio.
- [Avatar](/llms-output/primitives/avatar.md): An image element with a fallback for representing the user.
- [Checkbox](/llms-output/primitives/checkbox.md): A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
- [Collapsible](/llms-output/primitives/collapsible.md): An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.
- [Context Menu](/llms-output/primitives/context-menu.md): Displays a menu located at the pointer, triggered by a right click or a long press.
- [Dialog](/llms-output/primitives/dialog.md): A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window, rendering the content underneath inert.
- [Dropdown Menu](/llms-output/primitives/dropdown-menu.md): Displays a menu to the user—such as a set of actions or functions—triggered by a button.
- [Form](/llms-output/primitives/form.md): Collect information from your users using validation rules.
- [Hover Card](/llms-output/primitives/hover-card.md): For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.
- [Label](/llms-output/primitives/label.md): Renders an accessible label associated with controls.
- [Menubar](/llms-output/primitives/menubar.md): A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications that provides quick access to a consistent set of commands.
- [Navigation Menu](/llms-output/primitives/navigation-menu.md): A collection of links for navigating websites.
- [One-Time Password Field](/llms-output/primitives/one-time-password-field.md): A group of single-character text inputs to handle one-time password verification
- [Password Toggle Field](/llms-output/primitives/password-toggle-field.md): A password input field with an integrated button to toggle the value's visibility
- [Popover](/llms-output/primitives/popover.md): Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.
- [Progress](/llms-output/primitives/progress.md): Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.
- [Radio Group](/llms-output/primitives/radio-group.md): A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time.
- [Scroll Area](/llms-output/primitives/scroll-area.md): Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling.
- [Select](/llms-output/primitives/select.md): Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.
- [Separator](/llms-output/primitives/separator.md): Visually or semantically separates content.
- [Slider](/llms-output/primitives/slider.md): An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.
- [Switch](/llms-output/primitives/switch.md): A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
- [Tabs](/llms-output/primitives/tabs.md): A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time.
- [Toast](/llms-output/primitives/toast.md): A succinct message that is displayed temporarily.
- [Toggle Group](/llms-output/primitives/toggle-group.md): A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.
- [Toggle](/llms-output/primitives/toggle.md): A two-state button that can be either on or off.
- [Toolbar](/llms-output/primitives/toolbar.md): A container for grouping a set of controls, such as buttons, toggle groups or dropdown menus.
- [Tooltip](/llms-output/primitives/tooltip.md): A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.

### Utilities
- [Accessible Icon](/llms-output/primitives/accessible-icon.md): Makes icons accessible by adding a label.
- [Direction Provider](/llms-output/primitives/direction-provider.md): Wraps your app to provide global reading direction.
- [Portal](/llms-output/primitives/portal.md): Renders a React subtree in a different part of the DOM.
- [Slot](/llms-output/primitives/slot.md): Merges its props onto its immediate child.
- [Visually Hidden](/llms-output/primitives/visually-hidden.md): Hides content from the screen in an accessible way.

## Radix Themes

A styled component library built on Radix Primitives with a beautiful default theme.

### Overview
- [Getting started](/llms-output/themes/getting-started.md): Install Radix Themes and start building in minutes
- [Layout](/llms-output/themes/layout.md): Get the layout concerns right.
- [Releases](/llms-output/themes/releases.md): Radix Themes releases and their changelogs.
- [Resources](/llms-output/themes/resources.md): Related assets and resources.
- [Styling](/llms-output/themes/styling.md): How to approach styling with Radix Themes.

### Theme Configuration
- [Breakpoints](/llms-output/themes/breakpoints.md): Built-in breakpoints allow you to easily build adapative layouts.
- [Color](/llms-output/themes/color.md): Understanding the color system and it’s application in your theme.
- [Cursors](/llms-output/themes/cursors.md): Customizing cursors used for interactive elements.
- [Dark mode](/llms-output/themes/dark-mode.md): Using appearance to manage and integrate dark mode.
- [Theme overview](/llms-output/themes/overview.md): Use the Theme component to change the look and feel of your UI.
- [Radius](/llms-output/themes/radius.md): Choosing the right radius setting in your theme.
- [Shadows](/llms-output/themes/shadows.md): Understanding the shadow styles used in your theme.
- [Spacing](/llms-output/themes/spacing.md): Overview of the space scale and scaling options.
- [Typography](/llms-output/themes/typography.md): Guidance for using and tuning typography.

### Components
- [Accessible Icon](/llms-output/themes/accessible-icon.md): Makes icons accessible by adding a label.
- [Alert Dialog](/llms-output/themes/alert-dialog.md): Modal confirmation dialog that interrupts the user and expects a response.
- [Aspect Ratio](/llms-output/themes/aspect-ratio.md): Displays content within a desired ratio.
- [Avatar](/llms-output/themes/avatar.md): Profile picture, user initials or fallback icon.
- [Badge](/llms-output/themes/badge.md): Stylized badge element.
- [Blockquote](/llms-output/themes/blockquote.md): Block-level quotation from another source.
- [Box](/llms-output/themes/box.md): Fundamental layout building block.
- [Button](/llms-output/themes/button.md): Trigger an action or event, such as submitting a form or displaying a dialog.
- [Callout](/llms-output/themes/callout.md): Short message to attract user’s attention.
- [Card](/llms-output/themes/card.md): Container that groups related content and actions.
- [Checkbox Cards](/llms-output/themes/checkbox-cards.md): Set of interactive cards where multiple options can be selected at a time.
- [Checkbox Group](/llms-output/themes/checkbox-group.md): Set of interactive buttons where multiple options can be selected at a time.
- [Checkbox](/llms-output/themes/checkbox.md): Base input element to toggle an option on and off.
- [Code](/llms-output/themes/code.md): Marks text to signify a short fragment of computer code.
- [Container](/llms-output/themes/container.md): Constrains the maximum width of page content.
- [Context Menu](/llms-output/themes/context-menu.md): Menu representing a set of actions, displayed at the point of right click or long press.
- [Data List](/llms-output/themes/data-list.md): Displays metadata as a list of key-value pairs.
- [Dialog](/llms-output/themes/dialog.md): Modal dialog window displayed above the page.
- [Dropdown Menu](/llms-output/themes/dropdown-menu.md): Menu representing a set of actions, triggered by a button.
- [Em](/llms-output/themes/em.md): Marks text to stress emphasis.
- [Flex](/llms-output/themes/flex.md): Component for creating flex layouts.
- [Grid](/llms-output/themes/grid.md): Component for creating grid layouts.
- [Heading](/llms-output/themes/heading.md): Semantic heading element.
- [Hover Card](/llms-output/themes/hover-card.md): For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.
- [Icon Button](/llms-output/themes/icon-button.md): Button designed specifically for usage with a single icon.
- [Inset](/llms-output/themes/inset.md): Applies a negative margin to allow content to bleed into the surrounding container.
- [Kbd](/llms-output/themes/kbd.md): Represents keyboard input or a hotkey.
- [Link](/llms-output/themes/link.md): Semantic element for navigation between pages.
- [Popover](/llms-output/themes/popover.md): Floating element for displaying rich content, triggered by a button.
- [Portal](/llms-output/themes/portal.md): Renders a React subtree in a different part of the DOM.
- [Progress](/llms-output/themes/progress.md): Displays a progress bar related to a task.
- [Quote](/llms-output/themes/quote.md): Short inline quotation.
- [Radio Cards](/llms-output/themes/radio-cards.md): Set of interactive cards where only one can be selected at a time.
- [Radio Group](/llms-output/themes/radio-group.md): Set of interactive radio buttons where only one can be selected at a time.
- [Radio](/llms-output/themes/radio.md): Standalone radio button that can be used in any layout.
- [Reset](/llms-output/themes/reset.md): Removes default browser styles from any component.
- [Scroll Area](/llms-output/themes/scroll-area.md): Custom-styled scrollable area using native functionality.
- [Section](/llms-output/themes/section.md): Denotes a section of page content.
- [Segmented Control](/llms-output/themes/segmented-control.md): Toggle buttons for switching between different values or views.
- [Select](/llms-output/themes/select.md): Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.
- [Separator](/llms-output/themes/separator.md): Visually or semantically separates content.
- [Skeleton](/llms-output/themes/skeleton.md): Replaces content with same shape placeholder that indicates a loading state.
- [Slider](/llms-output/themes/slider.md): Provides user selection from a range of values.
- [Slot](/llms-output/themes/slot.md): Merges its props onto its immediate child.
- [Spinner](/llms-output/themes/spinner.md): Displays an animated loading indicator.
- [Strong](/llms-output/themes/strong.md): Marks text to signify strong importance.
- [Switch](/llms-output/themes/switch.md): Toggle switch alternative to the checkbox.
- [Tab Nav](/llms-output/themes/tab-nav.md): Navigation menu with links styled as tabs.
- [Table](/llms-output/themes/table.md): Semantic table element for presenting data.
- [Tabs](/llms-output/themes/tabs.md): Set of content sections to be displayed one at a time.
- [Text Area](/llms-output/themes/text-area.md): Captures multi-line user input.
- [Text Field](/llms-output/themes/text-field.md): Captures user input with an optional slot for buttons and icons.
- [Text](/llms-output/themes/text.md): Foundational text primitive.
- [Theme](/llms-output/themes/theme.md): Wraps all or part of a React tree to provide theme configuration.
- [Tooltip](/llms-output/themes/tooltip.md): Floating element that provides a control with contextual information via pointer or focus.
- [Visually Hidden](/llms-output/themes/visually-hidden.md): Hides content from the screen in an accessible way.

## Radix Colors

A gorgeous, accessible color system for designing beautiful websites and apps.

### Overview
- [Aliasing](/llms-output/colors/aliasing.md): How to use Radix Colors.
- [Custom palettes](/llms-output/colors/custom-palettes.md): How to create custom Radix Colors palettes.
- [Installation](/llms-output/colors/installation.md): How to install Radix Colors.
- [Releases](/llms-output/colors/releases.md): Radix Colors changelog.
- [How to use Radix Colors](/llms-output/colors/usage.md): How to use Radix Colors.

### Palette Composition
- [Composing a color palette](/llms-output/colors/composing-a-palette.md): A guide to composing a color palette with Radix Colors.
- [Scales](/llms-output/colors/scales.md): See all accessible color scales that Radix Colors provides.
- [Use cases](/llms-output/colors/understanding-the-scale.md): How to use Radix Colors.
